Research_direction: （软体、竹藤）家具材料、结构与绿色制造。
Paper:
[1] Gu Y., Zhang J. Fatigue Performance of Natural and Synthetic Rattan Strips Subjected to Cyclic Tensile Loading.Forests. 2022, 13(1): 76-89.
[2] Gu Y., Zhang J. Tensile Properties of Natural and Synthetic Rattan Strips Used as Furniture Woven Materials[J]. Forests, 2020, 11(12):1299-1312.
[3] Gu Y., Bian H., Wei L.,Wang R. Enhancement of Hydrotropic Fractionation of Poplar Wood using Autohydrolysis and Disk Refining Pretreatment：Morphology and overall chemical characterization[J].Polymers, 2019, 11(04): 1-11.
[4] Gu Y., Wu Z, Zhang J. Load-deflection behavior of rattan chair seats[J].Wood and Fiber Science, 2016,48(1):13-24.
[5] Gu Y., Wu Z, Zhang J. Tensile and bending moment resistances of T-shaped joints in rattan chairs[J]. Wood and Fiber Science, 2013, 45(4): 429-441.
Projects:
[1] 藤家具及其藤材力学性能研究
[2] 竹藤家具绿色设计产品评价规范研究
[3] 软体家具材料触感舒适性研究
[4] 卡扣式拆装木家具技术研究与制造
[5] 美式橱柜包装材料与结构的创新及应用
[6] 皮革或再生皮革制面带软垫的木框架坐具加工贸易单耗审定方法研究
Award_status: 江苏省科普公益作品大赛个人优秀奖、梅州市科学技术奖（排名第三）等。
Title: ：副教授
Name: 顾颜婷
Experience: 女，工学博士，副教授，美国密西西比州立大学访问学者，现任南京林业大学家居与工业设计学院教师。
